author: jukka
msg: JCR-2207: XATest error: commit from different thread but same XID must not block
Use Thread.join(long) instead of the more complicated TimeBomb mechanism.

author: jukka
msg: JCR-2087: Upgrade to Java 5 as the base platform
Use Iterables and the foreach loop construct to simplify code that accesses a ChangeLog.
